title: Can you buy rp with visa gift card
body: Can i buy rp on euw with a canadian visa gift card

replies.body: Can't really say for sure, but my thought is that Visa is pretty universal though the currency may be converted differently.  If you run into any issues, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can find some options for you.
